question: I am hypoglycemic and went off the pill about 5 months ago to start trying for a third child.  I had a period the next month and have not have one since then.  It has been 4 months without a period.  I am stressed, but not more so than usual.  But I have been craving sweets and food that is not good for me lately and have been etremely dehydrated.  I have also had cysts burst in the past.  Pregnancy tests are negative. Can anyone tell me if I should see a gyno or diabetes expert?  Has anyone else ever dealt with this?
title: absence of periods
